title: Ben Ben Xiao Feiche
synopsis: The story takes place in a fairy tale world. There is an archipelago divided into five continents. There are various creatures living on the continent, all in the shape of a car. In order to rescue the grandparents who were captured by the substitution, the protagonist Ben Ben needs to collect energy stones on various islands that can make him stronger. On the way, he met his little friends Xiao Ai, Gao Lala, and Dian Dian. For family and friends, they embarked on a trip around the Five Continents. During the journey, they passed through desert islands and circus islands with different geomorphological styles, doing what is right, helping others, overcoming difficulties, helping others, making new friends, fighting with the bad guys who came to thwart them, and gradually collecting them. New energy stone. The friendship of several people is gradually sublimated in the journey of helping each other. (translated from iqiyi)
